title: Dr. Larry J Loewen - Chiropractic, Crystal Falls MI
description: Detailed profile of Larry J Loewen, a Chiropractic specialist in Crystal Falls MI, providing phone numbers, practice locations, specialties and more
cleaned_text: J Loewen Dr. Larry J Loewen is a Chiropractic Specialist in Crystal Falls, Michigan. He graduated with honors from Life Chiropractic College - West in 2001. Having more than 22 years of diverse experiences, especially in CHIROPRACTIC, Dr. Larry J Loewen affiliates with Aspirus Iron River Hospital & Clinics, Inc, cooperates with many other doctors and specialists without joining any medical groups. Call Dr. Larry J Loewen on phone number [(906) 875-3215](tel:9068753215) for more information and advice or to book an appointment.
